verifyUser: select id_user_web from user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
verifyBlock: SELECT bl_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
verifyAttempts: SELECT at_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
selectPassUser: SELECT pa_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
restoreIntentos: UPDATE user_web SET at_user_web = 3 WHERE us_user_web = $1
disminuirIntentos: UPDATE user_web SET at_user_web = at_user_web - 1 WHERE us_user_web = $1
verifyIntentos: SELECT at_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
bloquear: UPDATE user_web SET bl_user_web = true, at_user_web = 0 WHERE us_user_web = $1
getDataSession: SELECT uw.id_user_web, uw.us_user_web, uw.em_user_web FROM user_web uw WHERE uw.us_user_web = $1
obtenerPermisos: SELECT p.na_profile profile, m.na_method method, o.de_object object, a.de_area area FROM permission pe INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id_profile = pe.id_profile INNER JOIN method m ON m.id_method = pe.id_method INNER JOIN object o ON o.id_object = m.id_object INNER JOIN area a ON a.id_area = o.id_area
addUser: INSERT INTO user_web (us_user_web, pa_user_web, em_user_web) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING id_user_web
seeUser: SELECT us_user_web as user, em_user_web as email FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
verifyMethod: SELECT m.id_method, m.na_method FROM method m INNER JOIN object o ON m.id_object = o.id_object INNER JOIN area a ON a.id_area = o.id_area WHERE a.de_area = $1 AND o.de_object = $2 AND m.na_method = $3
verifyProfile: SELECT id_profile FROM profile WHERE na_profile = $1
removePermission: DELETE from permission WHERE id_method = $1 AND id_profile = $2
getProfiles: SELECT p.na_profile FROM user_profile up INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = up.id_user_web INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id_profile = up.id_profile WHERE uw.us_user_web = $1
hasProfile: SELECT p.id_profile FROM user_profile up INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = up.id_user_web INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id_profile = up.id_profile WHERE uw.us_user_web = $1 AND p.na_profile = $2
setProfileUser: INSERT INTO user_profile (id_user_web, id_profile) VALUES ((SELECT id_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1),(SELECT id_profile FROM profile WHERE na_profile = $2))
setQuestionUser: INSERT INTO question (de_question, an_question, id_user_web) VALUES ($1, $2, (SELECT id_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $3))
cargarTodasPreguntas: SELECT id_question idQuestion,de_question question FROM question q INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = q.id_user_web WHERE uw.us_user_web = $1
obtenerDosRespuestas: SELECT an_question answer FROM question WHERE id_question IN ($1,$2)
updatePassword: UPDATE user_web SET pa_user_web = $1 WHERE us_user_web = $2
getMail: SELECT em_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
desbloquear: UPDATE user_web SET bl_user_web = false, at_user_web = 3 WHERE us_user_web = $1
addAttack: INSERT INTO pkmn.attack (de_attack, id_type) VALUES ($1, (SELECT id_type FROM pkmn.type WHERE de_type = $2))
removePokemon: DELETE FROM pkmn.pokemon WHERE id_pokemon = (SELECT id_pokemon FROM pkmn.pokemon WHERE na_pokemon = $1)
removeAttack: DELETE FROM pkmn.attack WHERE id_attack = (SELECT id_attack FROM pkmn.attack WHERE de_attack = $1)
removeType: DELETE FROM pkmn.type WHERE id_type = (SELECT id_type FROM pkmn.type WHERE de_type = $1)
removeGame: DELETE FROM pkmn.game WHERE id_game = (SELECT id_game FROM pkmn.game WHERE na_game = $1)
viewAttacks: SELECT a.de_attack attack, t.de_type type FROM pkmn.attack a INNER JOIN pkmn.type t ON t.id_type = a.id_type
viewPokemon: SELECT na_pokemon, im_pokemon FROM pkmn.pokemon WHERE na_pokemon = $1
addPokemonTypes: INSERT INTO pkmn.pokemon_type (id_pokemon, id_type) VALUES ((SELECT id_pokemon FROM pkmn.pokemon WHERE na_pokemon = $1), (SELECT id_type FROM pkmn.type WHERE de_type = $2))
addPokemonAttacks: INSERT INTO pkmn.pokemon_attack (id_pokemon, id_attack) VALUES ((SELECT id_pokemon FROM pkmn.pokemon WHERE na_pokemon = $1), (SELECT id_attack FROM pkmn.attack WHERE de_attack = $2))
addPokemonGames: INSERT INTO pkmn.pokemon_game (id_pokemon, id_game) VALUES ((SELECT id_pokemon FROM pkmn.pokemon WHERE na_pokemon = $1), (SELECT id_game FROM pkmn.game WHERE na_game = $2))
